Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

Address$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.

Examples

if (FALSE) {
x <- Address$new("User+tag@example.com")
x
x$local
x$local$valid()
x$host
x$host$valid()
x$valid()
x$fail()
x$munge()
x$normal()

x <- Address$new("User+tag@example.com",
  config = list(munge_string = "*^*^*^*"))
x$munge()
}
